channel.title: [PI] How do I add the Wilderness?
channel.description: When I got my new blank source for PI, I checked the wilderness and it did not work. Anybody know how to add the wilderness? Thanks- Cheeny

item.title: [PI] How do I add the Wilderness?

Kk, soooo hmm do you have skype? if so, add me: isez.n1
But anyways, I declare that in client.java right?

item.title: [PI] How do I add the Wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:


if(isInWilderness()) {//Check to see if the player is in certain coordinates. If so, the player is in the Wilderness.

                        int modY = absY > 6400 ?  absY - 6400 : absY;

                        wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1);

                        getPA().walkableInterface(197);

                        if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {

                                if(inMulti()) {

                                        getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);

                                } else {

                                        getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);

                                }

                        } else {

                                getPA().multiWay(-1);

                                getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);

                        }
}

item.title: [PI] How do I add the Wilderness?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

Add this:

if isInWilderness
(coordY >= #### && (coordY <= ####) && (coordX <= ####)
					&& (coordX >= ####)

Change the #### to the X and Y coords of the Wilderness.

Make sure to declare isInWilderness in your client class.

coordY >= 1337 && (coordY <= 0000) && (coordX <= 1234)
					&& (coordX >= 4321)

This means that if your character is in the specified coordinates, then it will cause the isInWilderness statement to become active. Thus making the Wilderness, the Wilderness.
Sorry, don’t know why the other message got deleted.

Read full topic
